title: Trends in mental health care and telehealth use across area deprivation: An analysis of electronic health records from 2016 to 2024
details: CK Ettman, GV Ringlein, P Dohlman, J Straub… - PNAS Nexus, 2025
abstract: While telehealth may improve access to healthcare for some, it may also widen gaps in access across different economic groups. Using electronic health records for outpatient mental health care of patients with depression in a large US academic …

title: Comparing AI-versus clinician-authored summaries of simulated primary care electronic health records
details: L Shemtob, A Nouri, A Sullivan, CS Qiu, J Martin… - medRxiv, 2025
abstract: Objective: To compare clinical summaries generated from simulated patient primary care electronic health records (EHRs) by ChatGPT-4 to summaries generated by clinicians on multiple domains of quality including utility, concision, accuracy and …
